item.title: Add Localeum

item.title: Added FlashDrive.io on Hosting section )
item.description: https://flashdrive.io - PaaS service similar to Heroku with a developer-centric approach and all inclusive features. Free tier for static assets, staging and developer apps.

item.title: Added FlashDrive.io (free tier available)
item.description: https://flashdrive.io - PaaS service similar to Heroku with a Developer-centric approach and all inclusive features. Dev Tier is free and perfect to host static assets and staging projects.

item.title: Add Lightly
item.description: https://www.lightly.ai/ - Improve your machine learning models by using the right data. Use datasets of up to 1'000 samples for free.

item.title: Added Mailtie.com to E-mail section
item.description: https://mailtie.com/ - Free Email Forwarding for Your Domain. No registration required. Free Forever.

item.title: Text Fix
